item.title: How can I fix this?
item.dc:creator: @13Michael37 13Michael37
item.description:
@13Michael37 wrote:

Add another one. If it doesn’t work, delete the one you added and delete another one. Simple as that.

item.title: How can I fix this?
item.dc:creator: @N11 -N-
item.description:
@N11 wrote:

I’ve been adding requirements to skills for skillcapes(Hitpoints, Prayer, Cooking, Fletching,Thieving, Slayer, Firemaking, and Woodcutting).

I added this into equipment level checking.

public int GetCLHitpoints(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 2701) { return 99; } }
For all the skills above.

Then the compiler says I’m either missing a bracket (}) or have one to many. If I have too many can you tell me where I should delete it and if I’m missing one/something else, would you tell me where to add that?

Read full topic
